thread.title: Atlanta Hawks' Thabo Sefolosha Acquitted of All Charges
thread.title_full: Atlanta Hawks' Thabo Sefolosha Acquitted of All Charges

author: Jeanette Torres
title: Atlanta Hawks' Thabo Sefolosha Acquitted of All Charges
text:
Share Article 
Rocky Widner/Getty Images (NEW YORK) -- Thabo Sefolosha was acquitted Friday of three counts stemming from an incident outside a New York City nightclub earlier this year.The Atlanta Hawks forward was arrested in April outside the nightclub, where former New York Knicks player Chris Copeland had been stabbed. Sefolosha had nothing to do with the stabbing but was charged with resisting arrest, obstruction and disorderly conduct.Sefolosha suffered a season-ending leg injury, and while his attorney conceded Sefolosha called a police officer a "midget," the defense argued he was the victim of excessive force by an officer with "implicit racial biases."
